availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Parker (Lewis County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk & notary public)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, notary public and circuit court clerk. Caldwell County, Missouri, native. Son of Seth Parker and Hannah A. Parker. Student in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Lewis County in 1860. Notary public in Lewis County in 1861. Clerk of the Lewis Circuit Court in Lewis County in 1863. Member of the Masonic Order.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 2, p. 168B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 963.
